meanings.definition: The state or quality of being fleshy.
meanings.sent1: Her fleshiness was evident in her round cheeks.
meanings.sent2: The baby's fleshiness made everyone want to pinch his chubby cheeks.
meanings.sent3: The cat's fleshiness was so adorable, it looked like a fluffy pillow.
meanings.sent4: The fleshiness of the ripe peach was a delight to bite into.
meanings.sent5: The fleshiness of the steak made it juicy and flavorful.

meanings.definition: The amount of flesh on a person's body.
meanings.sent1: His fleshiness increased after he started weightlifting.
meanings.sent2: The doctor noted the patient's fleshiness during the examination.
meanings.sent3: The wrestler's fleshiness helped him win the match by overpowering his opponent.
meanings.sent4: The fleshiness of the turkey on Thanksgiving was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The fleshiness of the model made her stand out in the fashion show.

meanings.definition: The presence of flesh or fat on an animal or plant.
meanings.sent1: The pig's fleshiness was a result of its healthy diet.
meanings.sent2: The farmer admired the cow's fleshiness as a sign of good health.
meanings.sent3: The plant's fleshiness surprised the gardener, indicating its robust growth.
meanings.sent4: The fish's fleshiness made it a prized catch for the fishermen.
meanings.sent5: The fruit's fleshiness indicated it was ripe and ready to eat.
